content: Well, this was cool. But… 1. The second word, e.i. “Picture” or “Actress”, falls to the right — italic is not good here. 2. What about long names? In Russia we used to test interfaces, this card is an interface, with the longest name and surname: “Konstantin Konstantinopolskiy”. You will have to fix each name or propose a better font size. The same goes to long titles. Good job, Ali 👍
